param.name: install_mpi
param.label: Install Intel-OneAPI-MPI?
param.help: If yes is selected, the job install intel-oneapi-mpi. Otherwise, you must provide a command to load MPI.

param.name: load_mpi
param.label: Command to load MPI
param.help: To load the MPI environment, enter the appropriate command, for example: module load module-name or source path/to/env.sh.

param.name: resource
param.label: Resource
param.help: Choose the resource for script submission

param.name: jobschedulertype
param.label: Select Controller, SLURM Partition or PBS Queue
param.help: Job will submitted using SSH, sbatch or qsub, respectively

param.name: wait_for_job
param.label: Wait for the PBS job or fire and forget?
param.help: If yes is selected, the PW job waits for the PBS job to complete while continuously monitoring its status and the possibility to cancel the PBS job when the PW job is canceled.

param.name: scheduler_directives
param.label: Type the scheduler directives
param.help: Type or copy paste the scheduler directives for the MPI job
